Game information:

The game's plot closely intertwined with the events of the
legendary and long-awaited Matrix sequel explosive Matrix:
Reloaded, opening up to the players white spots, which were
beyond movies. You expect a shootout with agents of the hurricane,
a dizzying bouts of experts in martial arts and managing the
fastest ship of humanity, the Matrix will swallow you!


Repack Features:

Enter the Matrix

Do not cut / recoded

The Matrix: Path Of Neo




Release year : 2005
Genre : Action / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer : Shiny Entertainment
Published by : Atari
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack : Deviance




System Requirements:

Operating system : Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor : 1.8 GHz
Memory : 512 MB
Video : 128 MB compatible with DirectX 9, Shader Model 2nd
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk : 4 GB

Game information:

Take a look around. Take a closer look at the world around.
Everything you see - the Matrix, a virtual reality.
This is a digital illusion, a dream that people unaware
that their real bodies are used as batteries. Machines
have enslaved humanity. But not all of us sleep everyday
life! Neo awake and ready to fight for the future of people.
You thought that you already know this story? Wake up after
Chosen and realize how badly mistaken! The game allows you
to relive the major twists and turns in the journey Favorites
and previously unknown routes lead the hero to a new climax.
"The Matrix: Path of Neo" is made based on the movie trilogy
"The Matrix", but not in the whole should cine prototype.
The authors of the updated scenario - the Wachowski brothers
themselves. Hence, narrative liberties are unlikely to
disappoint someone. You can not just do not like Neo did
in the movie, you can accomplish what he could not. And how
do you vzaimodeystvuesh with a character depends on the
outcome of the story. Combat mechanics in the game allows
you to attack from three enemies, and has a good balance
between melee and firearms combat. Also in the game adapts
to the player prisutsvujut difficulty level, new characters,
an original soundtrack, and vysokodetalizirovanaya schedule.

Game Features:

You are waiting for details and episodes
from the history of Neo, not included in the film.
New final stories, invented by the Wachowski Brothers.
Stunningly spectacular combat system.
Melee combat, the use of weapons and firearms.
The game has recreated the most dramatic moments of the film.


Repack Features:

The Matrix: Path Of Neo
Version of the game - v1.2
Do not cut / recoded
Includes crack text from 7 Wolf v1.06
Includes crack sound from Devil Soft / Siberian Studio v1.0
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
